mn68:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava kosalesu viharati nalakapane palasavane.
mn68:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena sambahula abhinnata abhinnata kulaputta bhagavantam uddissa saddha agarasma anagariyam pabbajita honti—
mn68:2.2: ayasma ca anuruddho, ayasma ca bhaddiyo, ayasma ca kimilo, ayasma ca bhagu, ayasma ca kondanno, ayasma ca revato, ayasma ca anando, anne ca abhinnata abhinnata kulaputta.
mn68:3.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhagava bhikkhusanghaparivuto abbhokase nisinno hoti.
mn68:3.2: Atha kho bhagava te kulaputte arabbha bhikkhu amantesi:
mn68:3.3: “ye te, bhikkhave, kulaputta mamam uddissa saddha agarasma anagariyam pabbajita, kacci te, bhikkhave, bhikkhu abhirata brahmacariye”ti?
mn68:3.4: Evam vutte, te bhikkhu tunhi ahesum.
mn68:3.5: Dutiyampi kho bhagava te kulaputte arabbha bhikkhu amantesi:
mn68:3.6: “ye te, bhikkhave, kulaputta mamam uddissa saddha agarasma anagariyam pabbajita, kacci te, bhikkhave, bhikkhu abhirata brahmacariye”ti?
mn68:3.7: Dutiyampi kho te bhikkhu tunhi ahesum.
mn68:3.8: Tatiyampi kho bhagava te kulaputte arabbha bhikkhu amantesi:
mn68:3.9: “ye te, bhikkhave, kulaputta mamam uddissa saddha agarasma anagariyam pabbajita, kacci te, bhikkhave, bhikkhu abhirata brahmacariye”ti?
mn68:3.10: Tatiyampi kho te bhikkhu tunhi ahesum.
mn68:4.3: Atha kho bhagava ayasmantam anuruddham amantesi:
mn68:5.2: Etam kho, anuruddha, tumhakam patirupam kulaputtanam saddha agarasma anagariyam pabbajitanam yam tumhe abhirameyyatha brahmacariye.
mn68:5.3: Yena tumhe, anuruddha, bhadrena yobbanena samannagata pathamena vayasa susukalakesa kame paribhunjeyyatha tena tumhe, anuruddha, bhadrenapi yobbanena samannagata pathamena vayasa susukalakesa agarasma anagariyam pabbajita.
mn68:5.4: Te ca kho pana tumhe, anuruddha, neva rajabhinita agarasma anagariyam pabbajita, na corabhinita agarasma anagariyam pabbajita, na inatta agarasma anagariyam pabbajita, na bhayatta agarasma anagariyam pabbajita, najivikapakata agarasma anagariyam pabbajita.
mn68:5.5: Api ca khomhi otinno jatiya jaraya maranena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upayasehi, dukkhotinno dukkhapareto;
mn68:5.6: appeva nama imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriya pannayethati—
mn68:5.7: nanu tumhe, anuruddha, evam saddha agarasma anagariyam pabbajita”ti?
mn68:6.1: “Evam pabbajitena ca pana, anuruddha, kulaputtena kimassa karaniyam?
mn68:6.2: Vivekam, anuruddha, kamehi vivekam akusalehi dhammehi pitisukham nadhigacchati annam va tato santataram, tassa abhijjhapi cittam pariyadaya titthati, byapadopi cittam pariyadaya titthati, thinamiddhampi cittam pariyadaya titthati uddhaccakukkuccampi cittam pariyadaya titthati, vicikicchapi cittam pariyadaya titthati, aratipi cittam pariyadaya titthati, tandipi cittam pariyadaya titthati.
mn68:6.3: Vivekam, anuruddha, kamehi vivekam akusalehi dhammehi pitisukham nadhigacchati annam va tato santataram.
mn68:6.4: Vivekam, anuruddha, kamehi vivekam akusalehi dhammehi pitisukham adhigacchati annam va tato santataram, tassa abhijjhapi cittam na pariyadaya titthati, byapadopi cittam na pariyadaya titthati, thinamiddhampi cittam na pariyadaya titthati, uddhaccakukkuccampi cittam na pariyadaya titthati, vicikicchapi cittam na pariyadaya titthati, aratipi cittam na pariyadaya titthati, tandipi cittam na pariyadaya titthati.
mn68:6.5: Vivekam, anuruddha, kamehi vivekam akusalehi dhammehi pitisukham adhigacchati annam va tato santataram.
mn68:7.2: ‘ye asava sankilesika ponobbhavika sadara dukkhavipaka ayatim jatijaramaraniya, appahina te tathagatassa;
mn68:7.3: tasma tathagato sankhayekam patisevati, sankhayekam adhivaseti, sankhayekam parivajjeti, sankhayekam vinodeti’”ti?
mn68:7.4: “Na kho no, bhante, bhagavati evam hoti:
mn68:7.5: ‘ye asava sankilesika ponobbhavika sadara dukkhavipaka ayatim jatijaramaraniya, appahina te tathagatassa;
mn68:7.6: tasma tathagato sankhayekam patisevati, sankhayekam adhivaseti, sankhayekam parivajjeti, sankhayekam vinodeti’ti.
mn68:7.7: Evam kho no, bhante, bhagavati hoti:
mn68:7.8: ‘ye asava sankilesika ponobbhavika sadara dukkhavipaka ayatim jatijaramaraniya, pahina te tathagatassa;
mn68:7.9: tasma tathagato sankhayekam patisevati, sankhayekam adhivaseti, sankhayekam parivajjeti, sankhayekam vinodeti’”ti.
mn68:7.11: Tathagatassa, anuruddha, ye asava sankilesika ponobbhavika sadara dukkhavipaka ayatim jatijaramaraniya, pahina te ucchinnamula talavatthukata anabhavankata ayatim anuppadadhamma.
mn68:7.12: Seyyathapi, anuruddha, talo matthakacchinno abhabbo punavirulhiya;
mn68:7.13: evameva kho, anuruddha, tathagatassa ye asava sankilesika ponobbhavika sadara dukkhavipaka ayatim jatijaramaraniya, pahina te ucchinnamula talavatthukata anabhavankata ayatim anuppadadhamma;
mn68:7.14: tasma tathagato sankhayekam patisevati, sankhayekam adhivaseti, sankhayekam parivajjeti, sankhayekam vinodeti.
mn68:8.2: kam atthavasam sampassamano tathagato savake abbhatite kalankate upapattisu byakaroti:
mn68:8.4: “Bhagavammulaka no, bhante, dhamma bhagavamnettika bhagavampatisarana. Sadhu vata, bhante, bhagavantamyeva patibhatu etassa bhasitassa attho. Bhagavato sutva bhikkhu dharessanti”ti.
mn68:9.1: “Na kho, anuruddha, tathagato janakuhanattham na janalapanattham na labhasakkarasilokanisamsattham na ‘iti mam jano janatu’ti savake abbhatite kalankate upapattisu byakaroti:
mn68:9.3: Santi ca kho, anuruddha, kulaputta saddha ularaveda ularapamojja.
mn68:9.4: Te tam sutva tadatthaya cittam upasamharanti.
mn68:9.5: Tesam tam, anuruddha, hoti digharattam hitaya sukhaya.
mn68:10.5: So kho panassa ayasma samam dittho va hoti anussavassuto va:
mn68:10.6: ‘evamsilo so ayasma ahosi itipi, evamdhammo so ayasma ahosi itipi, evampanno so ayasma ahosi itipi, evamvihari so ayasma ahosi itipi, evamvimutto so ayasma ahosi itipi’ti.
mn68:10.7: So tassa saddhanca silanca sutanca caganca pannanca anussaranto tadatthaya cittam upasamharati.
mn68:10.8: Evampi kho, anuruddha, bhikkhuno phasuviharo hoti.
